articles.title: Warmer weather does NOT kill off coronavirus: Two separate studies dash hopes for summer - Daily Mail
articles.description: US and Canadian researchers said the transmission risk was only reduced by about 1.5 per cent for every degree Fahrenheit above 77F (25C). They analysed 370,000 cases of the virus.

articles.content:
Conspiracy theory video clips about the coronavirus has been making the rounds online and raking up millions of views before being taken down by Facebook and YouTube. 
Experts have said the video clips contain false claims and dangerous advice.

articles.title: Coronavirus mutation to make the disease more contagious - Sky News Australia
articles.description: A coronavirus mutation has been identified in Australia which could enhance the infectiousness of the disease. Over 50 percent of all coronavirus cases studi...
articles.content:
A coronavirus mutation has been identified in Australia which could enhance the infectiousness of the disease.
Over 50 percent of all coronavirus cases studied by CSIRO were found to contain the strain.
Image: Getty
